com.complexible.stardog.gremlin

Class StardogGraphConfiguration

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.complexible.stardog.gremlin.StardogGraphConfiguration

  • public final class StardogGraphConfiguration
extends Object
    Tool for building valid Graph configuration settings for Stardog.
    Since:
    4.0
    Version:
    4.0
    Author:
    Edgar Rodriguez-Diaz

      Builder of valid configurations for Stardog Graph.
      static class  StardogGraphConfiguration.Reader
      Reader of valid configurations for Stardog Graph.

      Setting for the connection string to stardog.

      Setting to define the IRI to use for storing Element labels in Stardog.

      Setting for the passwords of the credentials to login to Stardog.

      Setting to enable reasoning in the Graph.
      static String TX_VERTEX_CACHE_SIZE
      Setting for the number of elements in the transactions cache.
      static String USER
      Setting for the username of the credentials to login to Stardog.

      • TX_VERTEX_CACHE_SIZE

        public static final String TX_VERTEX_CACHE_SIZE

        Setting for the number of elements in the transactions cache.

        E.g. "stardog.tx.cache.size"=1000
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • NAMED_GRAPH

        public static final String NAMED_GRAPH

        Setting for the named-graph used by the Graph to create.

        E.g. "stardog.named_graph"="http://complexible.com/graph1"
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

        Setting for the connection string to stardog.

        E.g. "stardog.connection"="http://localhost:5820/mydb"

        public static final String COMPUTER_VERTEX_CACHE_SIZE

        E.g. "stardog.computer.cache_size"=1000

        Throws:
